metadata.title: Climate Change Laws of the World
metadata.description: The Climate Change Laws of the World database gives you access to national-level climate change legislation and policies from around the world.

metadata.title: {text} climate laws and policies
metadata.description: Find climate change laws, policies, targets and other climate policy data and indicators for {text}, alongside information about their legislative process.

metadata.title: Law and Policy Search
metadata.description: Quickly and easily search through the complete text of thousands of climate change law and policy documents from every country.
